home.hero: Find places to spend sats wherever you are.
home.description: We use {osmLink} to tag places that accept bitcoin and we display those merchants in our beautiful apps.
home.openSource: Our apps and the underlying data are free and open source.

search.zoomInDetail: The merchant list shows locations when zoomed in closer
search.noVisible: No merchants visible in current view
search.locationPermissionDenied: Location permission denied. Enable it in your browser settings.
search.locationUnavailable: Could not determine your location. Please try again.
search.locationEnabled: Location enabled. List sorted by distance.

merchant.deletedNotice: This merchant has been removed from BTC Map and may no longer accept Bitcoin.
merchant.deletedDetail: The data shown below is outdated and for reference only.

verification.notSurveyed: This location needs to be surveyed!
verification.helpImprove: Help improve the data for everyone
verification.surveyedBy: Completed by BTC Map community members

boost.title: Boost
boost.improveVisibility: Boost this location to improve it's visibility on the map.

info.noCommunity: This location is not part of a community, but one can be {createLink} to help maintain this local area.

comments.title: Comments
comments.beFirst: No comments yet. Be the first to leave a comment!
comments.shareThoughts: Let others know your thoughts about this merchant.

errors.loadError: Could not load places from static CDN, please try again or contact BTC Map.
errors.updateError: Could not update places from API, using cached data.
errors.captchaFetch: Could not fetch captcha, please try again or contact BTC Map.
errors.noPaymentMethod: Please select at least one payment method...
errors.formSubmission: Form submission failed, please try again or contact BTC Map.
errors.locationSearch: Could not search for locations, please try again or contact BTC Map.
errors.mapView: Could not set map view to provided coordinates, please try again or contact BTC Map.

warning.noLocations: No locations found, please adjust query.

addLocation.businessOwner: If you're a business owner, please read our
addLocation.heading: Done-for-you
addLocation.description: Fill out the following form and one of our volunteer community members will add your location to the map.
addLocation.tooltip: All additions are completed on a volunteer basis and so we can't guarantee when your location will be added.
addLocation.addressTooltip: All locations are required to have a physical presence. Optionally enter an address here if that makes sense where the merchant is located. Services without locations are not map-able.
addLocation.notesPlaceholder: Please add further details here like additional merchant details, contacts, socials, etc.
addLocation.dataSourceOtherPrompt: How did you verify this information? Please provide as much detail as possible.
addLocation.contactDescription: If we have any follow-up questions we will contact you in order to add this location successfully. To speed up the process please check your spam folder in case it ends up there.
addLocation.supertaggerDescription: Contribute changes directly to OSM - like a üòé boss. Who needs forms anyway.

verifyLocation.hero: Help improve the data for everyone.
verifyLocation.heading: Verify Location
verifyLocation.subheading: (Ensure the information is still accurate and update it otherwise.)
verifyLocation.descriptionPart1: Please fill out the following form and one of our volunteer community members will update your location on the map. Did you know you can update this data yourself on
verifyLocation.tooltip: NOTE: Due to the backlog of requests and the updates being completed on a volunteer effort, it may take several weeks to update this location. It is encouraged to update the location on OpenStreetMap directly if you want to see the changes appear on the map right away.
verifyLocation.currentInfoDescription: Check this box if you have verified the existing data is up-to-date.
verifyLocation.outdatedPlaceholder: Provide what info is incorrect and the updated info on this location
verifyLocation.successMessage: Thanks for taking the time to fill out this report. We'll review your information and update it ASAP.

dashboard.verifiedNote: *Merchants with a survey:date, check_date, or check_date:currency:XBT tag less than one year old.
dashboard.tagsNotePart1: *More information on bitcoin mapping tags can be found

communities.description: Take ownership of your local bitcoin mapping data and help drive adoption. Bitcoin communities are the spark that ignites the movement. Join your friends, onboard businesses and have fun!
communities.leaderboardDescription: Bitcoin mapping communities maintain their local datasets and strive to have the most accurate information. They also help onboard new merchants in their area!
